attributes.action: lower the age of criminal responsability from 10 to 7
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to lower the age of criminal resposability from the age of 10 to 7. Figures out from last year show that over 3000 under 10’s have committed crimes and have not been prosecuted. If we do not dicipline the young offenders at an earlier age there is a strong chance of them re-offending later on in their teens (increasing teenage crime)
